logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • logger.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    cory The client side log functions for interactiing with the rifffish database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        public Logger()
        Creates a logger that uses a default Offline logging scheme

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String rifffish_api_key,
              int numberOfTransactions,
              int machineId)
        Creates a logger that sends logs to a remote server after a set amount of transactions. Not guaranteed to log on the exact specified transaction due to threading.
        Parameters:
        numberOfTransactions - the number of transactions that need to occur before they are sent to the server. 0 = immediately sent to the server
        rifffish_api_key - api key given by the server. See profile page when logged in
        machineId - Id of the vending machine that the server gives you

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String rifffish_api_key,
              LogDate date,
              int machineId)
        Creates a Logger that sends the logs to a remote server at a set time. If an invalid date is entered the default is: 1:01am on the 1st of the month
        Parameters:
        rifffish_api_key - api key given by the server. See profile page when logged in
        date - the set time logging scheme to use
        machineId - Id of the vending machine that the server gives you
